roleset.name: transform

roles.note: "Start state" and "thing changing" are usually the same, but there canbe cases where they are separate. Reserve use of Arg3 for these cases.

example.name: Within light verb construction
example.text: Now , did there come a time when you learned that the board had made a change to the biology curriculum ?

example.name: Question: with args 2 & 3
example.text: What is the change from liquid to solid called?

example.name: All arguments...depressing
example.text: Standard & Poor's (S&P) announced their change to the debt outlook of United States from 'stable' to 'negative.'
example.arg: to the debt outlook of United States

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry change.01. VerbNet classes 26.6.1 45.4.
